problem.markdown:
Refer A-03 from Exercises Set A. Based on the details given, and assuming the process to be quasi-static, calculate the expansion work done by the system in kJ. If the expansion work is done on the system, be sure to use the negative sign.
= 392 +- 20
[explanation] The value of the expansion work is calculated as p*(V2 -V1) since the process is quasi- static. [explanation]
